short_summary: Aircraft painting service. Revitalize the CF-104 Starfighter, CT-33 and CF-101B Voodoo aircraft located at the Winnipeg Air Park.
description: Restoration of CF-104, CT-33 and CF-101B Voodoo aircraft for representation of Heritage and not for operational purposes, painting is optional but allows restoring historical appearence of the heritage items. Note: This request for proposal (RFP) is a small initiative, with a budget of only CAD 100,000, for the renovation at 17 Wing, Winnipeg.
